body: A natural 1 (the d20 comes up 1) on a saving throw is always a failure (and may cause damage to exposed items; see Items Surviving after a Saving Throw). A natural 20 (the d20 comes up 20) is always a success.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Saving Throws/Automatic Failures and Successes
name: Automatic Failures and Successes
